columns.name: framework_name
columns.description: The unique name of a backup framework.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup framework resource.

columns.name: framework_description
columns.description: An optional description of the backup framework.

columns.name: deployment_status
columns.description: The deployment status of a backup framework.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The date and time that a framework was created.

columns.name: number_of_controls
columns.description: The number of controls contained by the framework.

columns.name: framework_status
columns.description: The framework status based on recording statuses for resources governed by the framework (ACTIVE | PARTIALLY_ACTIVE | INACTIVE | UNAVAILABLE).

columns.name: framework_controls
columns.description: A list of the controls that make up the framework. Each control in the list has a name, input parameters, and scope.
